protein.specific_function: May play an important role in regulating or promoting cell proliferation in some normal and neoplastically transformed cells.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on single donors with incorporation of molecular oxygen, incorporation of two atoms of oxygen
positive regulation of smooth muscle contraction
